channel.title: Can Someone tell me if this is

item.title: Can Someone tell me if this is
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Volrom, post:4, topic:199095”]Denis,

[In addition to what GS wrote…]

If you wanted to add, say Torag, you would search “torag” or “2029” in autospawn.cfg, then edit the coords to whatever you want (Like X = 3345 Y = 3251). Then, go into the npc.cfg and edit “Torag’s” stats, like so: lvl = 511 hp = 480, and the character “Torag” will seem the same lvl 115, but the server translates the stuff to make lvl 115 as 511 or whatever you put. Same as hp. If this was helpful, please +rep me!

-Volrom[/quote]Shut the fuck up about rep dumbass. He doesn’t even have 15!

Read full topic

item.title: Can Someone tell me if this is
item.dc:creator: @Volrom Volrom
item.description:
@Volrom wrote:

Denis,

[In addition to what GS wrote…]

If you wanted to add, say Torag, you would search “torag” or “2029” in autospawn.cfg, then edit the coords to whatever you want (Like X = 3345 Y = 3251). Then, go into the npc.cfg and edit “Torag’s” stats, like so: lvl = 511 hp = 480, and the character “Torag” will seem the same lvl 115, but the server translates the stuff to make lvl 115 as 511 or whatever you put. Same as hp. If this was helpful, please +rep me!

-Volrom

Read full topic

item.title: Can Someone tell me if this is
item.dc:creator: @gs1 gs
item.description:
@gs1 wrote:

looooooooooooool someone lied to you horribly

you go to autospawn.cfg and at the bottom press enter to make a new space and copy the one before the last and paste it then change the numbers like this
the first 4 is the npc id the next 8 are the co ordinates x is first then y then put 0 for the rest except the last number put 0 so it wont walk and will be on the ground and the words is the npc its not really important

item.title: Can Someone tell me if this is
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I’m just wondering if this is correct. I want to add NPC’s to the new area that i have made. I’m useing Reforced’s Project Czar. I’m going to make it not even look like Project Czar. But i need someone to help me add NPC’s.

Anyway’s, Can someone see if this is right?,

 [code] else if (NPCID == ###)

{
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop(NumberofYourShopHere);
}[/code]

So Who ever will help Please Post here and if i need anymore help all just Private message you. I will also give you some credits depending on what you help me with.

-Deni-Scape

Read full topic
